dmca.title: Copyright abuse - spam website/email from your customer
dmca.body:
o Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jon Swenson [mailto:jon@sharkspage.com] Posted At: Tuesday, May 
> 09, 2006 3:35 PM Posted To: Copyright
> Conversation: FW: Copyright abuse - spam website/email from your 
> customer
> Subject: Re: FW: Copyright abuse - spam website/email from your 
> customer
> 
> 
> To theplanet.com, gotwebhost.com, and dotster.com:
> 
> 
> This website [pheerhockey.com] is hosted by gotwebhost.com or 
> theplanet.com and is currently using dotster.com dns servers, is 
> currently using unauthorized content from a number of different 
> websites without their permission.
> 
> Up until two months ago, he used images and text from my website, 
> although the images from my website were removed. He displays the 
> unauthorized content on his website pheerhockey.com, surrounded by 
> adult advertisements and photos. His contact information in the whois 
> directory is not correct, and he has failed to respond to repeated 
> requests to remove unauthorized content from his website.
> 
> 
> The website using unauthorized content:
> http://www.pheerhockey.com
> 
> Websites he is stealing content from:
> http://www.sharkspage.com [over 30 individual posts] 
> http://www.theiceblock.com http://onthewings.blogspot.com/ 
> http://goonblog.com http://predatorsden.jasonkirk.net/
> http://mightyducksofanaheim.blogspot.com/
> http://www.kuklaskorner.com/index.php/hockey/
> 
> Websites in the past who have publicly complained about 
> pheerhockey.com stealing content.
> http://www.dowlersolutions.ca/blog/archives/2005/11/the_brave_new_w.ht
> ml
> [Brave new world of blogging piracy]
> http://mirtle.blogspot.com/2005/11/ya-har-its-blogging-piracy-part-2.h
> tm
> l
> http://mirtle.blogspot.com/2005/11/ya-har-its-blogging-piracy.html
> http://www.puckupdate.com/archives/2005_11_13-2005_11_19.html#001923
> http://www.ericmcerlain.com/offwingopinion/archives/005362.php [Mr 
> Pheer RSS Feed Hijacker]
> 
> Example invidiual posts of mine from sharkspage.com used without 
> consent [a partial list] 
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/san-jose-state-downs-duke-blue-devils-
> 10
> -2/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/sjsu-faces-duke-blue-devils-on-black-s
> at
> urday/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/top-10-jerseys-sold-on-nhlcom/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/hockey-notes-january-31st-edition/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/miami-ohio-university-climbs-to-no-1-o
> n- usa-todayusa-hockey-magazine-mens-college-hockey-poll/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/more-cal-vs-stanford-photos-and-video/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/comments-cellphone-hockey-photos-anyon
> e/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/stockton-thunder-lose-to-long-beach-2-
> 1-
> in-overtime-shootout/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/sharks-lose-to-phoenix-6-2-hold-a-play
> er
> s-only-meeting/
> 
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/stanford-wins-late-against-berkeley-6-
> 5/ 
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/cal-opens-first-game-of-the-big-freeze
> -w
> ith-a-13-3-win-over-stanford/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/hockey-notes-january-27th-edition/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/8-goals-scored-in-third-period-nationa
> l- conference-downs-american-conference-7-6-in-2006-echl-allstar-game/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/mario-lemieux-retires/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/2006-echl-all-star-skills-competition-
> re
> sults/
> http://www.pheerhockey.com/main/stockton-goaltender-jake-moreland-name
> d-
> as-echl-allstar-game-replacement/
> 
> 
> Pheer Hockey was contacted twice asking to remove the unauthorized 
> content.
> The last time being May 1st, 2006. No response was received. Please 
> ask him to remove unauthorized content from his website immediately, 
> or remove his content from your servers.
> 
> Thanks for your time. I expect action on this request Shortly.
> 
> 
> 
> More DNS and hosting information:
>

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jon Swenson [mailto:jon@sharkspage.com] Posted At: Wednesday, 
> May 03, 2006 5:25 PM Posted To: Copyright
> Conversation: Copyright abuse - spam website/email from your customer
> Subject: Copyright abuse - spam website/email from your customer
> 
> 
> To speedzhost.com, dotster.com, theplanet.com, and godaddy.com, and 
> possibly a few others,
> 
> 
> I am not filing a formal copyright complaint at this time, because I 
> do not believe I have enough information to do so. What I would like 
> to ask is that each of your companies investigate the websites below. 
> I believe they are created by the same individual, who is possibly one

> of your customers.
> 
>   From autogoodible.com, which I believe is a godaddy.com customer, 
> and anvet.net a theplanet.com hosted site which is run by the same 
> person [who is using unauthorized content on over a dozen of his other

> websites]. I do not have time to track all of his other sites down, 
> but hopefully you will.
> 
> 
> Spam websites this individual has created using unauthorized 
> copyrighted
> 
> content from others:
> 
> http://anvet.com/anvet/personal-injury-lawyer-san-jose/774/
> http://espn-video-games.autogoodible.com/17664/
> http://rare-video-games.autogoodible.com/12951/
> http://hockeynhl.be/updates/?p=982
> http://espn-video-games.autogoodible.com/12069/
> http://wicked.a1e1blog.com/1/cheap-ski-tickets-tahoe/
> http://blogger.inmyfinger.com/blogs/orgasm-man-woman/13338/
> http://www.blogtrigger.com
> http://nhl-hockey.be/updates/?p=336
> http://hockeynhl.be/updates/?p=563
> http://www.pheerhockey.com
> 
> 
> Tools I used to try to figure out where his websites are hosted from:
> 
> http://www.samspade.org/t/whois?a=AUTOGOODIBLE.COM;server=auto
> http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/lookup.ch?name=http%3A%2F%2Fanvet.com&ty
> pe
> =A
> http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/lookup.ch?name=autogoodible.com&type=A
> 
> 
> Domain or web hosts he is using
> 
> theplanet.com
> godaddy.com
> dotster.com
> speedhostingz.com
> speedzhost.com
> 
> 
> Please, shut this guy down. If you need me to file a formal complaint,

> to document any of his actions, or to spend a little more time to do 
> more research. Give me a call at the number below, or email 
> jon@sharkspage.com.
> Thanks for your time.
> 
> 
> 
> Jon Swenson
> http://www.sharkspage.com
> http://www.designinformation.com

> speedzhost.com, speedhostingz.com, uce@ftc.gov.
